imod::IModel

imod::IModel Class Reference
[Model/Observer concept]

Common interface for model objects, that supports Model/Observer design pattern. More...

#include <IModel.h>

Inheritance diagram for imod::IModel:

List of all members.

 Attaches model object to observer observerPtr.
virtual void DetachObserver (IObserver *observerPtr)=0
 Detaches model object from observer observerPtr.

virtual bool IsAttached (const IObserver *observerPtr) const =0
 Returns true if observer observer is attached to this model object.

Detailed Description

Common interface for model objects, that supports Model/Observer design pattern.

See also:
IObserver

Definition at line 24 of file IModel.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool imod::IModel::AttachObserver ( IObserver *  observerPtr  )  [pure virtual]

Attaches model object to observer observerPtr.

Warning:
Please note, that double call of this function for the same observer will cause an assertion.

Implemented in imod::CModelBase, and imod::CModelProxy.

virtual void imod::IModel::DetachAllObservers (  )  [pure virtual]

Detaches all attached observers.

Implemented in imod::CModelBase, and imod::CModelProxy.

virtual void imod::IModel::DetachObserver ( IObserver *  observerPtr  )  [pure virtual]

Detaches model object from observer observerPtr.

Warning:
Please note, that call of this function for the observer which is not attached to the observer observer will cause an assertion. To prevent this, you can use the isAttached() function.

Implemented in imod::CModelBase, and imod::CModelProxy.

virtual bool imod::IModel::IsAttached ( const IObserver *  observerPtr  )  const [pure virtual]

Returns true if observer observer is attached to this model object.

Implemented in imod::CModelBase, and imod::CModelProxy.
